name: Blue Bunny Demo Game
description:
This is the demo of my first platform game.

Blue Bunny must collect all the coins and gems that he finds in the forest but he must avoid the dangers and not disturb the other animals.

Controls:

Walk to the right: "d" or "rigth"

Walk left: "a" or "left"

Jump: "space"

Climb: "up"

The final game will consist of 10 levels and I hope I can publish it soon, meanwhile, I hope you enjoy this demo and it would help me a lot to know your opinion to continue improving.

Hope you enjoy the demo!

Credits:
